<span data-ttu-id="6add1-103">Da biste videli zaglavlja i druge detalje na e-mail, izaberite tri tačke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6add1-103">To see the headers and other details in an email, select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
